reviews.review: yea , nothing special to say , just play

El juego es muy divertido ¿Por que no lo recomiendo?

Básicamente está lleno de bugs, llevo varios días jugando y soy alguien que le interesa jugar con amigos, hacer un grupo de supervivientes y ir juntos intentando coordinarnos y hacer estrategias.

Para empezar, a veces no nos deja hacer premade por errores del juego, otras veces cuando sale partida nos divide en dos distintas, y por si acaso para encontrar cada una de las partidas tarda fácilmente +10minutos, bastante insano teniendo en cuenta de que SOLO tiene que emparejar con 1 persona más, ya que somos 4. 

Si juegas solo y te interesa asesino se podría decir de que si que te va a ir bien, pero acabo de salir de una partida abandonandola después de matar a 3 (uno tiró de cable) y quedarme encerrado dando vueltas por el mapa con todos los demás jugadores muertos. 



Resumiendolo en una frase: Un juegazo insoportablemente mal dirigido

¿De verdad vale la pena?  No, de momento no

Es un juego (por lo que tengo entendido) completo, que ya no se encuentra en fase beta ni nada por el estilo pero cuenta con demasiados bugs y no lo digo por nomas con mas de 200 hrs en el juego jugando como asesino y como superviviente.

Puedo asegurarles que este juego cuenta con una gran variedad de BUGS y por si fuera poco jugadores que son camperos (esta bien, si,  porque les reparas) pero es demasiado estresante cuando al que campean es a ti.

 y por si los supervivientes no la tuvieran dificil, lo que yo llamo Fotografia que es cuando te quedas (como superviviente) congelado sin poder moverte (ya sea reparando, forcegueando o saboteando)

Juego mucho con myers y en las ventanas me quedo atascado (en las del asilo crotus pren o algo asi) y me enoja mucho porque si estoy siguiendo a un superviviente se me escapa

Ojo: este juego es muy bueno y te la pasas muy bien con amigos pero como esta con estos bugs no lo recomndaria
Tip Top!
Ha mejorado mucho la cosa, casi que podría hacer una critica positiva pero me da palo.

Confusing. Confusing, and really hard when you're new. But I don't seem to be learning how to play at all either. Or how to level up, or do the blood web thing. [strike]It doesn't have a keybinder either, which I need with a laptop keyboard that has broken keys, from age.[/strike] But then it also doesnt tell you what buttons to press to do things, it doesn't tell you what to do in the game/in rounds, or how to play. As killer I'm roaming around and I cannot find them for shit until a generator symbol pops up so I go there and the person is long gone, obviously. I don't even know if I can sprint either, [strike]considering my shift key is broken.[/strike] As human I have no idea what I'm doing, I find a generator and try to fix it which takes like 2 minutes, and it just continues like that until we either win or somehow the killer keeps tracking me down, injuring me till death. even if im doing nothing but hiding. The bugs, if there are any, as people keep saying, I don't even see. Probably cause the game seems so poorly made already that I can't tell the difference.


Edit: This game is still confusing and poorly made even after all this time. The bloodweb makes no sense, its impossible to get any survivors, its beyond confusing in all.

Do not purchase.

I will start out by saying that I was very against buying this game but a friend of mine had it and pressured me into it. Boy am I glad he did! All of the bad reviews for this game are nitpicks (aside from losing your progress) that in the end do not ruin the gameplay one bit. Just play the game for a couple days and don't worry about how long it takes to get a game going. Just alt-tab and browse reddit or something. I've noticed that most of the time the game works perfectly fine. 

Play the game for a few days because most of the glitches seem to be gone after you get some character progression and learn not to touch menus while the games are searching/loading.  I learned to survive and realised that camping killers are only harming themselves. You can almost get the exit open with three people in the time one person dies from hanging on the hook. If you see a camper, just go and work on the generators! They are giving you a free win.

Also, before you complain about the killers; go and play a couple of them. Their eyesight and hearing is limited, the survivors can easily outrun you if they know where barriers are, and you have to get your attack down perfect or you'll miss every time. I found them being way harder to play than the survivors. In the end, this is easily worth the money I got it on sale for and I'd say worth the $20 even with the glitches you'll encounter.

Ich kann die ganzen negativen Kommentare garnicht nachvollziehen. Klar gibt es immer wieder Probleme mit den servern aber ihr müsst es so sehen: "Es ist noch nicht vor all zu langer Zeit Frisch aus der Beta." Das Spiel hat eine angemessene Grafik mir einer guten Performance über die es sich nicht streiten lässt. Die Entwickler haben hierbei eine gute idee gehabt und mit ein wenig unterstützung der Community lässt sich das ganze auch noch mehr ausbauen wie z.b. mehr Fixes, erweiterte ideen des spielinhaltes oder auch einem Mega Patch mit mehr Spielmodis. Das Ziel des spiels ist es als überlebender mithilfe deines Teams zu überleben, die Reaktoren zu reparieren und die Ausgangstore mit energie zu versorgen, sodass der Ausgang naht. Als Killer ist es deine Aufgabe dies zu verhindern und alle überlebenden zu töten. Im ganzen kann man sagen, dass obwohl es Probleme mit den servern gibt, es mir jedoch sehr viel Spaß macht und ich mich auf die nächsten Patches freuen werde.

Bitte versteht die Entwickler und unterstützt sie.

An sich eigentlich ein echt geiles Game, aber mit den Verbindungsproblemen und Bugs macht das echt langsam kein Spaß mehr, jedes mal sind die ganzen Opfergaben weg oder man muss zu 2 oder 3 gegen den Killer spielen wegen Disconnects oder man bekommt keine Punkte, weil der Killer einfach raus geht, kurz bevor man entkommt. Man müsste bei Disconnect alle bis dahin erspielten Punkte, Opfergaben und Co behalten, und es müsste eine Abstimmung geben oder sofort zurück in die Lobby, wenn in den erten 30 Sekunden des Spieles jemand ein Disconnect hat.

This game is a hot mess but a weirdly unique one at that. Despite more games in the "Asymmetrical multiplayer horror" genre coming out including "Last Year" and "Friday the 13th" Dead by Daylight has remained a cult favorite and the one to last the longest among its peers.
DBD is constantly being updated with new content and rebalancing of perks/items. While sometimes these break the balance and/or introduce bugs, the game is overall very enjoyable. There have been phases where I didn't like playing the game anymore and even months at a stretch where I uninstalled it but time and time again I find myself returning to Dead by Daylight.
It's particular blend of action & stealth has made it a standout in a genre it helped define. Despite all its flaws both technical and creative, Dead by Daylight is a game that you won't soon forget.

Rework after 1,1k hours:
(swf = survivial with freinds squad)

>> Great concept, bad implementation <<
They kinda ruined this game over the years with their attempt to balance this game. Once it was fun playing alone and even more playing with friends. Nowadays u r kinda forced to play with friends bc otherwise you won't enjoy this game most of the time.

Starting at low ranks the game seems far simple as killer and survivor as long as u have atleast a bit of a clue what you're doing. But going up higher in the ranks brings out the worst in the mankind.

As a killer you will be:
- bullied with noise spam
- bullied with flash lights
- feel like u have no power when facing a good swf

.. but still win most of your games since it's fairly simple when u dont face well coordinated teams. But it will be extremely sweaty and boring most of the time since you kinda have to either use broken addons or offerings, or patroul/tunnel/slug sometimes. Which is as a fair player nothing anybody in this game should ever do since it just makes this community even worse.

As a survivor you will be:
- most likely surrrounded by potatos
- get tunneld very often
- get camped very often
- get a mori after 1st hook at 5 gens very often
- facing completly broken addons in combination with moris very often
- not having fun a lot of the times without having a swf squad

Once it was fun playing alone. Now it's a pain in the *. As a constant red rank that played this game since it first release I witnessed this game evolving into what it is atm. And back in the day there have been a lot of broken things in the game they removed. But now u r kinda forced to play with a squad u can communicate with bc if u r facing a good killer and you r all by yourself u will most likely dont stand a chance. It's pretty common to get tunneled, camped or moried after 1st at 5 gens which is literally hilarious and completely unnecessary. You will have a  slight chance don't take me wrong, but to get this you have to play this game for reaaaaally really long to learn everything and get good at looping and knowing when to do what. Nothing you'll acquire in your first 300h. Just saying. 
+ never try to talk to this community or use postgame chat! Insults, insults, spam - nothing else. Tocicity >>> 100 and IQ < 10 in general, atleast thats what it seems most of the time. Really sad how everything evolved.

>> This game is meant to be frustrating << (Statement by the Developers)

.. and it really is. I love it, but I hate it. And now the times has come where I finally quit this game. I'd love to get the new cosmetics for kate but everytime I play this game it's a * in the ass and I can't take it anymore.

>> Honestly, this game isn't worth ur money nor your time anymore. << *sad face*

Okay lets Talk about Dead by Daylight.

Pros
1. This game is awesome 
2. Every Killer has a special power to help them hunt 
3. The items are pretty cool
4. Each stage has its own challenge
5. lol it has a very cool creepy factor.
6. The perks you get are kinda cool for both killer and survivor.
7. The DlC are awesome always have awesome new killers.

Cons
1. Dont like how survivors can sabotage the hooks its kinda unfair to the killer because then you gotta drag a survivor all the way to the basement.
2. Not that many items to customize your killer or any new weapons.
3. If survivors can sabotage hooks then you should give the killer a longer timer on holding a survivor. 
4. Should add other game modes besides turning on generators.
5. Make the killers run just a little bit faster.
Queue way faster now. But Balance still bs in both directions.

Die derzeit erschienen DLC sind alle sehr gut gemacht und haben das Spiel bereichert! Der ein oder andere Killer ist schon happig aber mit Übung und längerer Spielzeit bekommt man die Tricks raus! 
Es gibt nur einen Nachteil! Oft hat man lange Wartezeiten in den Lobbys, das ist zwar kein Beinbruch aber es kann den ein oder anderen nerven. 
Alles in einem ein super Spiel, mit hohem "Suchtfaktor". Auch ein tolles Level und Ranking System steht dahinter.

Dead By Daylight is an asymmetrical "Point and Click" killer adventure based on bugs, lags, exploits and stupid people that think it's a competitive game.

Sin duda nada que ver con el Friday the 13. Después que la empresa se asustara por la gran salida del Friday estos se pusieron las pilas y añadieron los queridísimos y añorados server que todos los jugadores veteranos buscaban desde hace un año además un cuadradito que te decía el ping de todos los jugadores en lobby. Y el juego en su contenido es uno de los mejor desarrollados y divertidos. Sin duda es un juego que por 20€ vale muchísimo la pena pero os recomiendo esperar alguna oferta para que sean diez euros u algo así. Después los DLC's diréis que aquí viene lo malo pero si le pilláis cariño al juego ya veréis que no váis a dudar en apoyar a la empresa para más cositas nuevas y además algunos DLC's son gratis ;).
Enserio no os arrepentiréis es un juego lleno de adrenalina, miedo y diversión, y con amigos gastaréis infinidad de horas pegados a la pantalla trolleando y tomando el café :D. Y para rematar estáis comprando un juego completo que esto es importante con lo que se está viendo en este 2017.

Dead by Daylight : 6/10. Test détaillé sur  http://lesgrosjeuxdupc.fr/dead-by-daylight/
Pour Le test vidéo c'est ici : https://youtu.be/KXYFkU1QXbY

Résumé :

++ Ca va trancher chérie !!!
++ Les différents profils des survivants
++ Les tueurs avec des styles et des armes variés
++ L’atmosphère oppressante et frustrante des « Slashers » des années 90.
++ La peur de se faire attraper par le tueur
++ Le plaisir jouissif et malsain de traquer et attraper « sa proie »
++ Les nombreuses mécaniques coopératives (soigner, libérer, réparer, se cacher)
++ Les tests d’habiletés qui cassent la routine et qui peuvent tout faire foirer
+   Le système de compétences (objets, accessoires, offrandes)
+   Les points de sang qui permettent de faire évoluer le personnage ou le tueur qu’on veut


-    J'ai encore fait dans mon froc
-    Des maps qui se ressemblent parfois
-    Pas de réglage de luminosité dans les menus…
--   … ce qui n’est pas un mal car l’obscurité, comme le fond de teint, masque la misère graphique (pauvreté des couleurs, bâtiments et environnement grossiers, modélisation des personnages)
--   8 Euros le DLC pour 1 map et pouvoir jouer Mickael Myers : où comment assassiner les joueurs
--   5mn pour trouver un serveur stable…
--   … quand ce n’est pas le Matchmaking qui plante sur des temps de chargement infinis…
--   … quand ce n’est pas le Anti Cheat System (anti-triche) qu’on peut appeler Anti Shiiit Système qui empêche le jeu de se lancer
--   Une version Early Access qui demande encore beaucoup de travail… Ha meeerde, ce n'est pas un Early Access, le jeu est sorti il y a 6 mois !!! Désolé je croyais vraiment que le jeu était encore en Bêta Test.

Dead By Daylight est un jeu original par son concept et prenant pour le joueur. Ses nombreuses mécaniques coopératives et l'atmosphère qu'il instaure font que chaque partie est différente. Malheureusement, sans parler de l'aspect graphique baveux ni des DLC coûteux mais pauvres en contenu, les gros défauts techniques plombent le jeu dans ses plus grandes largeurs. Les gros soucis de connexions, de serveurs instables, de matchmaking bancal et du système anti-triche qui pénalise les joueurs sont à la limite de l'acceptable pour un jeu sorti il y a plusieurs mois déjà.

 A acheter lorsque le jeu fonctionnera correctement.

El juego esta muy bien, pero como todo tiene carencias la principal son los BUGS que tiene el juego. Tampoco ayuda que algunos asesinos sean campers. Pero en general es un juego bueno y entretenido

He de decir que tras 600h dedicadas  a este juego mejor no lo juguéis. La comunidad de jugadores ha hecho del juego una experiencia que no se disfruta. Ya que se beneficia el camperismo que cada vez hay mas y el no ayudar al resto de jugadores. Ademas los desarrolladores del juego sólo hacen el juego mas complejo para los supervivientes sin balancear la jugabilidad.

The game is fun at first, then you start to realise how unbalanced everytrhing is, its completely geared to the killer as far as game play goes. in addition if you try to play with anymore than 2 friends you run into trouble actually joinin games due to ping differences, its like the game cant find a compatible host. 

then there is the low level surviver tanking system, if you run into a camper killer and are unlucky enough to be put on a hook, its sya later ranks, so basicly every 2nd game. ranking as a killer is easier, there really needs to be more detriment to sabotarging and hook camping on both sides....

Ive never enjoyed and then crashed into a centre of hate towards this game...

Dead by daylight review

Its a game where there is a killer and 4 survivors the survivors goal is too power up 5 generators and escape and the killer needs to kill the 4 survivors before they escape the killer needs to put the survivors on meat hooks to sacrifise them to the "entity" there is a level system ingame called the "bloodweb" when a game ends a player is rewarded ploodpoints too spend on the bloodweb it can used to get perks or items or addons for your items there is also an ingame mechanic where when at least 3 people are dead/escaped you can locate an hatch and escape there you need to have repaired at least 2 generators to do it

this is my review please upvote it if you would like other people to see it

It takes a long while to get playing if I pair up with friends to survive, not sure if it's a matchmaking management system thing, or if they set it so that players that play alone end up with a higher priority to get into a killer's lobby. It's kind of annoying, but the game itself is pretty dang fun. I'd say it's worth a purchase, especially when it's on-sale.

Though I do wish I could get something out of killing my friends other than just practice.
Really fun to play with friends.
Игра хороша, но жаль, что нельзя орать в микрофон.
